## Workflow.read() method

Observe an output name

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
read(name?: string): Maybe<TableContainer>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The output to observe. If falsy, this will observe the default output of the final step. If no observable is ready yet, a new observable will be created |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Maybe](./workflow.maybe.md)<!-- -->&lt;TableContainer&gt;
